headline: Has STERIS' 30% 2025 Rally Left Much Value on the Table?
summary: Wondering if STERIS is still worth buying at today’s price, or if most of the upside has already been captured? This breakdown will help you decide whether the current market tag makes sense. Despite a small pullback of 1.1% over the last week and a flat 30 day move, the stock is still up 30.0% year to date and 23.2% over the last year, suggesting that investors have been steadily repricing its prospects. That rerating has been underpinned by a steady stream of positive updates around...
